mapper.select: SELECT w.id id, w.user_id, w.association_name, w.association_id, w.is_accept, date_format(w.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime FROM ass_users w WHERE w.delete_status = 1 AND w.user_id=#{user_id} ORDER BY w.id DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

SELECT ac.id, ac.name, ac.association_id, ac.association_name, ac.details, date_format(ac.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, date_format(ac.update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime, date_format(ac.start_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') startTime, date_format(ac.end_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') endTime, ac.is_open
FROM ass_users au LEFT JOIN activity ac ON au.association_id = ac.association_id WHERE au.user_id = #{user_id} AND au.delete_status = 1 AND au.is_accept=1 ORDER BY ac.id DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

SELECT count(0)
FROM ass_users au LEFT JOIN activity ac ON au.association_id = ac.association_id WHERE au.user_id = #{user_id} AND au.delete_status = 1 AND au.is_accept=1
select count(0) from act_ass_user WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and association_id=#{association_id} and activity_id=#{activity_id}
